com.angel.sdk
Class BleScanner

java.lang.Object
  com.angel.sdk.BleScanner

public class BleScanner
extends java.lang.Object

Scans for available Bluetooth devices.

This class gives a concise interface for Bluetooth devices discovery. Each discovered device is reported via a callback object configured in the constructor.

Nested Class Summary
static interface BleScanner.ScanCallback
          BleScanner reports about the discovered devices using this interface.
 
Constructor Summary
BleScanner(Activity activity, BleScanner.ScanCallback scanCallback)
          Creates and configures a new BleScanner instance.

                  BleScanner.ScanCallback scanCallback)
           throws BluetoothInaccessibleException
Creates and configures a new BleScanner instance.

Parameters:

Throws:
